title: 82/554/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 July 1982 approving the extended plan for the eradication of enzootic bovine leucosis submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 July 1982
approving the extended plan for the eradication of enzootic bovine leucosis submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany
(Only the German text is authentic)
(82/554/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The extended plan for the eradication of leucosis as applied by the Federal Republic of Germany from 1 June 1981 is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 1 June 1981.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
